description: This file sets up a legal consulting agent using various modules for knowledge base, language model, and vector database, and demonstrates querying the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent that can process knowledge and respond to queries.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base built from PDF URLs, supporting vector search.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: OpenAI language model interface for chat-based interactions.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given query, optionally streaming.
